instruction: Imagine you are building a game that has 3 levels. Describe the difficulty level and game progress for each level.
output: Level 1 is easy with an introductory game progress. There are simple step-by-step instructions and slower pace for the user to understand the mechanics of the game. Level 2 is more challenging with an intermediate game progress. There are more complex tasks and greater difficulty that require coordination and strategy. Level 3 is difficult with an advanced game progress. It has a fast pace, requiring quick reaction time and critically thinking skills to complete the level.
